mapper.select: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m-%d',BillTime) as billDate, count(*) as numOfBill, round(SUM(PaidFee),2) as totalAmount, SUM(Persons) as numOfCust, round((round(SUM(PaidFee),2)/SUM(Persons)),2) as billPerCust FROM MhtBill WHERE 1 = 1 and billDate < date(#{param2}, '+1 day') and billDate > date(#{param2},'-7 day') GROUP BY date(BillTime) ORDER BY date(BillTime) ASC
